_xResult.title: Say I'm Sweet Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made midi skirt with pleats
_xResult.longdesc:
Make any day a special occasion in this sweetheart of a skirt. This made to measure piece is a red midi, made of the thickest of taffetas. The large folds make beautiful pleats and the impeccable finishes (plus pockets!) differentiate it from off-the-rack retail. This skirt pairs easily with form-fitting tops or short blazers or jackets. Wear you new favorite skirt to the symphony, on a date or just lounging around dreaming of your next movie premier!


You need a skirt made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
